txt.en: 'Where is it that you come from?'
Register your heritage with the notary.

'Ah... from the White Mountains.\n\n'You are from the south-western halls of Ered Nimrais, the White Mountains in the south bordering the lands of Andrast. Though your kingdom lies far from the central mountains where Men once dwelt, the rumour of the Oathbreakers has given your realm an ill name.'
Speak with Wárr Ink-sleeve, the dwarf notary
Wárr Ink-sleeve can be found in the Great Hall of Thorin's Hall.
